Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Dioicin-1 (Ribosome-inactivating protein; rRNA N-glycosidase; Plant defense)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the ribosome-inactivating protein family (Type 1 RIP subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Nicks pBR322 dsDNA. Has adenine polynucleotide glycosidase activity on herring sperm ssDNA.

Literature.Title: Type 1 ribosome-inactivating proteins from Phytolacca dioica L. leaves differential seasonal and age expression, and cellular localization.
Literature.Author: Parente A, Conforto B, Di Maro A, Chambery A, De Luca P, Bolognesi A, Iriti M, Faoro F.
